text: Shanghaied! is the third studio album by New Zealand new wave band Mi-Sex, released in October 1981. The album peaked at number 28 on the Australian Kent Music Report. ==Reception== Ian McFarlane described the album as "arguably the band's best album... [which] failed to impress the record-buying public."McFarlane, 'Mi-Sex' entry. Archived from the original on 7 August 2004. Retrieved 7 May 2016. ==Track listing== ==Charts== {| class="wikitable sortable plainrowheaders" |- !Chart (1981/82) !Peak position |- ! scope="row"|Australian Kent Music Report NOTE: Used for Australian Singles and Albums charting from 1970 until ARIA created their own charts in mid-1988. | style="text-align:center;"|28 |- |} ==References== Category:Mi-Sex albums Category:CBS Records albums Category:1981 albums
title: Shanghaied!
